findings.title: Block gas limit
findings.description: The updateEmissionRate function can fail due to block gas limit if the pool size is too big.

findings.title: add function issue
findings.description: If some LP token is added to the contract twice using function add, then the total amount of reward eggReward in function updatePool will be incorrect.

findings.title: Wrong burning
findings.description: Sending tokens to the dead address instead of burning them in TaiToken.sol.
